content: this legal document summarizes the progress of a case in the court of palermo the case involves the division of hereditary and ordinary community property between two parties the court has ordered the dissolution of the community and the sale of the properties with the proceeds to be distributed equally between the parties the court has also addressed the issue of exclusive use of a property in cefalu and found no evidence to support the claim the defendants request for reimbursement of expenses related to the properties has been granted the court has concluded by stating that the costs of the proceedings will be shared equally between the parties the judgment was made on july 6 2020 in palermo
